# button

**Instance Property**

The button displayed in the status bar.

## Declaration

```swift
var button: NSStatusBarButton? { get }
```

## Discussion

The status item automatically creates this button by default. Use this property to customize the appearance and behavior of the button, such as its [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSButton/image], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSControl/target], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSControl/action], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/toolTip], and so on.

## Managing the Status Item’s Behavior

- **behavior**: The set of allowed behaviors for the status item.
- **NSStatusItem.Behavior**: A set of optional status item behaviors.
- **menu**: The pull-down menu displayed when the user clicks the status item.
